content: a 6 using straight stitch fill in the pieces sideburns and sides behind the ears sew the head to the body to complete jacket the jacket is made in black yarn in the same way as the coat in part a but only up to row 12 lapels are made in the same way sew the coat to the body following the instructions as per part a arms make as in part a but change to black yarn starting from round 4 add a rare earth magnet to the tip of the right arm if desired and sew to the body yes they can hold hands now wings make as in part a but use black yarn sew to the jacket and anchor to the arms and nape as above finishing cut a 1x0 5cm piece of dark grey felt and trim to a shape vaguely resembling a snake s head stick to the middle of the body over round 15 cut two 0 5x7cm pieces of dark grey felt and loosely knot them together stick to the front of the body as shown disclaimer good omens aziraphale and crowley belong to the brilliant minds of neil gaiman and terry pratchett i accept no responsibility for any misplaced infants missing archangels or nice and accurate prophecies regarding the end times and beyond resulting from the creation of this project there were angels dining at the ritz and a nightingale sang in berkeley square © akabekobotan 2023
